home.standardConsultantDescription: Get a detailed beauty analysis based on your responses to a comprehensive beauty questionnaire.
home.premiumConsultantDescription: Experience a live, one-on-one video consultation with an expert, tailored to address your specific beauty goals.

brandVoucher.description: There are no vouchers from this brand. Enter a valid voucher code in the bar above.

platformVoucher.description: There are no vouchers from {{platformName}}. Enter a valid voucher code in the bar above.

product.title: No Products Found
product.description: We couldn't find any products matching your criteria. Please try adjusting your filters or search for something else.

productDetail.title: Product Not Found
productDetail.description: The product you're looking for either does not exist, has been removed, or is currently unavailable.

cart.title: Cart
cart.checkoutDescription: (This price includes VAT, but does not include shipping fees)
cart.acceptCondition: By clicking "Place Order", you agree to comply with the
cart.soldOutMessage: This product classification is sold out, please choose another.
cart.hiddenMessage: This product classification is hidden, please choose another.
cart.maxQuantityError: The remaining quantity of this product classification is {{maxQuantity}}.
cart.negativeQuantityError: The quantity cannot be less than 1.
cart.addToCartSuccess: The product has been added to your cart.
cart.tmpTotalProductPrice: Estimated price (when applying the vouchers above)
cart.voucherNote: *Please add vouchers at the checkout step to receive the price mentioned above
cart.buyToDiscountCurrency: Spend {{minOrder, currency}} to get a discount of {{discount, currency}}. Limited number of vouchers available
cart.buyToDiscountPercentage: Spend {{minOrder, currency}} to get a discount of {{discount}}%. Limited number of vouchers available

address.title: Address
address.updateSuccess: Your address has been successfully updated!

voucher.title: Voucher
voucher.chooseProductBrandAlert: Please choose at least one product from the brand to apply vouchers.
voucher.chooseProductAppAlert: Please choose at least one product to use vouchers.
voucher.howToUseDescription: To apply an Allure Voucher code, click the "Save" button to claim the voucher and check it in your voucher wallet.
voucher.howToFindDescription: You can find Allure Vouchers throughout the website and app. Here's a tip: start with the promotion pages and the brand's homepage!

off.specificDescription: Applicable for certain specific products of {{val}} in the promotion.

voucher.bestDiscountAmountDisplay: Voucher for up to {{amount, currency}} off

reason.notApplicable: This voucher is not applicable to the selected items or does not meet the usage conditions.
reason.soldOut: This voucher is no longer valid because the applicable products are out of stock.
reason.notStart: This voucher is not yet valid. Please check the start date and try again later.
reason.minOrder: This voucher requires a minimum order of {{amount, currency}} to be used.

dialog.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.saveCard: We partner with reputable payment service providers to ensure that your card information is safe and secure. Allure will not have access to your card details.
wallet.cvvDescription: CVV is a 3-digit verification code printed on the back of your credit card.

order.successDescription: We will receive an order confirmation email with details of your order and a link to track it's progress.
order.failureDescription: Unfortunately, we were unable to process your order. Please try again later or contact support for assistance.

toast.success: Your request has been successfully processed, continue with your work.
toast.error: An error occurred while processing your request, please try again later. If the problem persists, please contact the support team.
toast.info: This is a message to provide important additional information related to your work.
toast.warning: You are about to perform a unsafe action, please be cautious. If you are not sure, please contact the support team.

productCart.title: Remove item
productCart.description: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your cart?
productCart.success: Item has been successfully removed from your cart.

cart.title: Remove {{amount}} items
cart.description: Are you sure you want to remove {{amount}} items from your cart? This action cannot be undone.
cart.success: {{amount}} items have been removed from your cart. You can continue shopping to add new items.

cart.title: No items selected
cart.description: You have not selected any items in your cart for checkout. Please select at least one item to proceed.
cart.insufficientStockDescription: Some items you selected in your cart have insufficient stock: {{products}}. Please update your cart to continue.
cart.soldOutDescription: Some items you selected in your cart are sold out: {{products}}. Please deselect these items to proceed.
